message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_RELATION_TYPE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The service offering cannot be found. Please enter service offering name.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_DUPLICATE_FUND_NAME
message.locale: The fund name entered is already present. Please enter a different Fund Name.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XFV_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Start Date should not be after the End Date.

message.name: ERR_FUND_FV_STARTDATE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Start Date should be Entered.

message.name: ERR_FUND_FV_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: Type should be selected.

message.name: ERR_FUND_FV_NAME_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Fund Name should be entered.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_ASSOCIATION_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED_AS_LINEITEM_PRESENT
message.locale: The Association Type cannot be modified as Fund Line Items are present for corresponding fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_ASSOCIATION_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_AS_LINEITEM_PRESENT
message.locale: The Association Type or Product/Service cannot be deleted as Fund Line Items are present for corresponding fund.

message.name: ERR_FISCALYEAR_FV_YEAR_MANDATORY
message.locale: Please select a Fiscal Year to create a Fiscal Year Budget.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_LINEITEM_STARTDATE_BEFORE_FUND_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Fund Start Date cannot be later than the Fund Line Item record Creation Date associated with the Fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_LINEITEM_ENDDATE_AFTER_FUND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Fund End Date cannot be before the Fund Line Item record Creation Date associated with the Fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_FUND_AS_FUNDFISCALYEAR_IS_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: The Fund cannot be deleted as there is a Fund Fiscal Year associated with the fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_FUND_AS_FISCALYEARLINEITEM_IS_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: The Fund cannot be deleted as there is a fund fiscal year line item associated with the fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_FUND_AS_FUND_ASSOCIATION_EXISTS
message.locale: The Fund cannot be deleted as there is a Fund Association associated with the fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_CANNOT_DELETE_FUND_AS_WAITLIST_IS_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: The Fund cannot be deleted as there is a Wait List entry associated with the fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_FV_COMMENTS_ARE_MANDATORY
message.locale: When deleting a fund, comments must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_DUPLICATE_PRIORITY
message.locale: An Association with the same priority already exists. Please specify some other priority.

message.name: ERR_FUND_FV_INVALID_PRIORITY
message.locale: An Association cannot be created with the zero Priority.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE_BETWEEN_FUND_STARTDATE_AND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Fund Association Start Date must be between Fund Start Date and End Date.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_ASSOCIATION_ENDDATE_BETWEEN_FUND_STARTDATE_AND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Fund Association End Date must be between Fund Start Date and End Date.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_ASSOCIATION_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An Association with the same product already exists.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_ASSOCIATION_STARTDATE_BEFORE_FUND_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Fund Start Date cannot be later than the any Fund Association Start Date associated with the Fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_ASSOCIATION_ENDDATE_AFTER_FUND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Fund End Date cannot be before any Fund Association End Date associated with the Fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_FISCAL_YEAR_OUTSIDE_FUND_EFFECTIVE
message.locale: Fiscal Year falls outside the period the fund is effective.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_FISCAL_YEAR_OVERLAP
message.locale: The date range of the fiscal year overlaps with one associated with existing fund fiscal year.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_FUND_START_DATE_BEFORE_FISCAL_YEAR_START_DATE
message.locale: The fund start date, %1d, must be on or after the fiscal year start date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_FUND_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_FUND_CONFIGURATION_EFFICTIVE_DATE
message.locale: The fund start date %1d must be on or before the fund configuration effective date %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEAR_XRV_FUND_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: This fund has already been canceled, a new fund fiscal year cannot be created.
This fund has already been cancelled, a new fund fiscal year cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEAR_XRV_FUND_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The fund has already been canceled, this fund fiscal year cannot be modified.
The fund has already been cancelled, this fund fiscal year cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FUNDLINK_XRV_FUND_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: This fund has already been canceled, a new fund association cannot be created.
This fund has already been cancelled, a new fund association cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_FUNDLINK_XRV_FUND_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The fund has already been canceled, this fund association cannot be modified.
The fund has already been cancelled, this fund association cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FUNDLINK_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The Fund Association cannot be modified, there are obligations created against the fund for this product or service.

message.name: ERR_FUNDLINK_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Fund Association cannot be deleted, there are obligations created against the fund for this product or service.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_THIS_FUND_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Fund cannot be deleted, there is an obligations associated with the fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Fund cannot be deleted, there is a budget adjustment associated with the fund.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_OBLIGATION_EXIST_BETWEEN_ORIGINAL_STARTDATE_AND_PROPOSED_STARTDATE_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The Fund has an obligation created for the period between the %1d and %2d, the start date cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_OBLIGATION_EXIST_BETWEEN_ORIGINAL_ENDDATE_AND_PROPOSED_ENDDATE_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The Fund has an obligation created for the period between the %1d and %2d, the end date cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEAR_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Fund Fiscal Year cannot be deleted, there are obligations created against the fund for that fund fiscal year.

message.name: ERR_FUNDEDITEMRULESET_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The Funding Rule Set Association cannot be modified, there are obligations created against the fund for this product or service.

message.name: ERR_FUNDEDITEMRULESET_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Funding Rule Set Association cannot be deleted, there are obligations created against the fund for this product or service.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_OBLIGATION_STARTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_FUND_STARTDATE
message.locale: Fund Start Date must be on or before the obligation Start Date, %1d.

message.name: ERR_FUND_XRV_OBLIGATION_STARTDATE_LATER_THAN_FUND_ENDDATE
message.locale: Fund End Date must be on or after the obligation End Date, %1d.
